What is the Verus Coin Foundation, and what is its vision?

The Verus Coin Foundation is an organization dedicated to promoting and developing Verus Coin. Its vision is to create a Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS) platform, which would enable individuals and organizations to create their own blockchains and decentralized applications.
